entry.title: TIL 30-03-2020 Git push --atomic
entry.summary: For continuous integration puropses, I need to be sure some of my commits are all done together. If some fail for some reasons, I have to reconciliate everything t o be sure it is ok. After some research, I found a git command that helped…
entry.content:
For continuous integration puropses, I need to be sure some of my commits are all done together. If some fail for some reasons, I have to reconciliate everything t o be sure it is ok. After some research, I found a git command that helped me a lot: 

git push --atomic origin branch1 branch2 ...

 The idea with this command is to have only one commit doing multiple things. It can help to merge, tag and add a note in a single command for example. 

For more informations, you can read this github article. 

 

Enjoy!

entry.content:
I needed to recreate a resume and I didn't want to do it with MS Word or with Latex as I did before. As a web developer, i was almost sure some web resources exist. After googling for few minutes, I discovered Novo Resume .

The website is very user friendly and I created my resume in less than an hour with a good result. You can choose differents templates and customize them with differents colors or fonts. Some of them are free, other can be used only with an upgraded account.

Upgraded account brings more templates and more customization. You still can try all these option to your free account but you will not be able to download your resume. 

All your changes are automatically saved and you can download your resume in PDF. 

It is easy! You should try it !
